ComicInfo.Summary: Elmyria Fuhd is a supergenius savant that at the age of six is the shadow government's sole zombie biologist. She has discovered the fungus that has infected the human race and created the zombie infestation. As part of her routine investigations, she discovers the Littlest Zombie among her subjects, and she takes special interest in him. Unfortunately for Elmyria, the survivors dislike the shadow government almost as much as they dislike zombies.
